Based on your preferences and the given list of movies, I would recommend the following two movies:

1. "Maid in Manhattan" (2002) - This romantic comedy follows the story of a young woman who moves to New York City to pursue her acting dreams. However, upon her arrival, she discovers that her dream job is not even available to her! And to make matters worse, she also finds out that her dream boyfriend is already taken by another girl, and this other girl happens to be the same girl as the dream boyfriend of the young woman! And then, just when everything seems to be going wrong for the young woman, she discovers that her acting skills are actually even better than the acting skills of the very famous actors in Hollywood who have all starred in multiple highly successful movies throughout their entire careers in Hollywood! And so, with this newfound knowledge about her own acting skills, the young woman suddenly becomes not only much more confident in herself and her own abilities as an actress, but also actually even more motivated to pursue her own dreams of success as an actress than ever before in her entire life as an actress! And so, with this newfound motivation and confidence as an actress, the young woman sets out on a new journey of adventure and discovery, not only as an actress, but also as an adventurer, explorer, and discoverer!
